messages.subject: Diabetes in children---vaccinations
messages.msgSnippet:  There s one vaccine that I haven t seen mentioned yet, it s natural and I don t know of any negative side-effects (at least for the recipient!)  What is
messages.messageBody:
There's one 'vaccine' that I haven't seen mentioned yet, it's
natural and I don't know of any negative side-effects (at least for
the recipient!) What is it? Breastfeeding!! LOL

I'm reading with interest, our girls both had the regular (in the
UK) jabs, until recently, when we stopped. Big fuss now about
this year's 'flu vaccine, being recommended for over 65's, was
over 70's or 75's last year...

Tracy

messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] FW: Diabetes in children---vaccinations
messages.msgSnippet: in children who have received multiple ... One of the deiciding factors for me in this issue, is that the nation of Japan does not begin their cycle of
messages.messageBody:
in children who have received multiple
> vaccines starting after 2nd month of life.

One of the deiciding factors for me in this issue, is that the nation of
Japan does not begin their cycle of vaccinations until the children are 2
years old. Given the population density of that island nation, if polio and
pertussis were not a problem for them, then why on earth are we placing
vaccines in the bodies of 2 month old babies?

We know that the liver is not fully mature until age 8, so we are asking
immature livers to clean a system exposed to materials we know causes
diseases. It just never seemed logical to me.

LisaKK

messages.subject: FW: Diabetes in children---vaccinations
messages.msgSnippet: Vaccines Proven To Be Largest Cause of Insulin Dependent Diabetes in Children Diabetics Advised to Seek Legal Counsel Now, Before Their Right to Compensation
messages.messageBody:
Vaccines Proven To Be Largest Cause of Insulin Dependent
Diabetes in Children Diabetics Advised to Seek Legal Counsel
Now, Before Their Right to Compensation Expires
Dr. J. Bart Classen, an immunologist at Classen Immunotherapies, presented
data on September 11 at the International Public Conference on Vaccination
which proved vaccines are the largest cause of Insulin Dependent Diabetes in
Children. His data indicated that vaccines cause approximately 80% of cases
of insulin dependent diabetes in children who have received multiple
vaccines starting after 2 month of life.
Dr. Classen presented data supporting a causal relationship between many
different vaccines and the development of insulin diabetes. His data
included the pertussis, mumps, rubella, hepatitis B, hemophilus influenza
and others. The data indicated people with vaccine induced diabetes may not
develop the disease until 4 or more years after receiving a vaccine.
Lawyers attending the conference and who reviewed the data, advise diabetics
to seek legal counsel at once. The government provides compensation for
vaccine induced injuries however there is a statute of limitations. Insulin
dependent diabetes cost the patient about $1 million over their life time.
Dr. Classen's research has been published in numerous journals and featured
in national news reports. For the latest information on the effects of
vaccines on insulin dependent diabetes and other autoimmune diseases visit
the Vaccine Safety Website at http://vaccines.net .
